title: I think my account has been hacked into
body: When i launch the League client and try to enter my password it says my password is incorrect. However, my password was very easy to remember and i wouldn't  have forgotten it, also i had clicked on a dodgy link. The person had sent me a link and said his account had been hacked and should not click on the link, but he had said this after I had clicked it. It said sign in and looked like the league sign in page and i quickly closed it. I have clicked forgot password on the league client and entered my account name but no email has been sent after a whole day when it said it will only take 5 minutes. I just want my account back, it has my credit card details on it as well. I have filled out a ticket yesterday and i have gotten no response.

replies.body:
Waiting for a response on your ticket is probably the best move here since we're unable to assist with account recoveries here on the Boards.

If you have any questions, please let me know.
